metadata.title: CVE-2020-13132 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Yubico libykpiv before 2.1.0. An attacker can trigger an incorrect free() in the ykpiv_util_generate_key() function in lib/util.c through incorrect error handling code. This could be used to cause a denial of service attack.

criterions.comment: yubico-piv-tool package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.1-3').
